trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_SEQ_00<tab>Cahciua is ready to take to the sky on mehwapyarra-back.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the museum curator.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Erenville.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Cahciua.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat again.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_ERENVILLE_000_001<tab>I know one shouldn't judge by appearance, but still...
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CLEYRACURATOR_000_005<tab>Hello there! Come to ride the mehwapyarras, have you?
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CAHCIUA_000_010<tab>Begging your pardon, but this is where you can go on leisure flights, yes?
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CLEYRACURATOR_000_011<tab>Indeed it is! Bearing you will be our adorable mehwapyarras, who are especially trained by a Turali friend!
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CLEYRACURATOR_000_012<tab>Just say the word, and we will send you up, up, and away!
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CAHCIUA_000_013<tab>And there you have it! Shall we, then?
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_ERENVILLE_000_015<tab>It seems I'll have to trust to the theory of ancestral levitational predisposition...

TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_ERENVILLE_000_020<tab>In case you are unfamiliar, the theory holds that all life-forms have an innate capacity for levitational magicks. While said magicks generally remain latent, they may manifest in the ability to fly.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CAHCIUA_000_025<tab>My guess is that the mehwapyarras themselves cannot fly, but rather their saddles are imbued with levitation magicks.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CLEYRACURATOR_000_030<tab>You are ready? Then go ahead and mount up. The mehwapyarras fly a set route, so you need only relax and enjoy the view!
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>Ride the mehwapyarra?
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CAHCIUA_000_032<tab>Hahaha! How exhilarating!
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_ERENVILLE_000_033<tab>I'll be damned... They really do fly...
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CAHCIUA_000_034<tab>Hey, the way we're flying in formation, don't we look like migrating birds?
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_ERENVILLE_000_035<tab>Except we're on giant rodents...
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CAHCIUA_000_036<tab>Speaking of migrating birds, the mallard is where your name comes from. Did I ever tell you that?
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_ERENVILLE_000_037<tab>That I knew, but I learned it from the shamaness, not from you.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CAHCIUA_000_038<tab>A migrating bird can fly anywhere it desires─even across oceans to distant continents.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CAHCIUA_000_039<tab>And you've done just that, my clever mallard!
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_ERENVILLE_000_040<tab>I'd thank you not to call me that!
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CAHCIUA_000_041<tab>Oh dear, is it over already? Time really does <var 1A 02 /var>fly<var 1A 01 /var> when you have fun!
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CAHCIUA_000_042<tab>What a joy to see Living Memory from up high!
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_ERENVILLE_000_043<tab>...
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CAHCIUA_000_044<tab>Ahhh, that was wonderful! An experience worth saving for the very end!
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CAHCIUA_000_045<tab>You two enjoyed yourselves as well, I trust?
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_ERENVILLE_000_046<tab>It was enjoyable enough, I suppose.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CAHCIUA_000_047<tab>From my fussy bunbun, that's high praise. I'm glad I invited you and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CAHCIUA_000_048<tab>Thank you for indulging me.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_ERENVILLE_000_049<tab>...
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CAHCIUA_000_050<tab>If I could, I'd go for another hundred rides, but I must settle for the one.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CAHCIUA_000_051<tab>It's time we were headed to the Aero Terminal. If there are still things you wish to do, you'll want to do them now.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CAHCIUA_000_052<tab>When you're ready, make your way along the path yonder. I'll find the others and let them know the same.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CLEYRACURATOR_000_055<tab>Please come and fly again any time!
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_ERENVILLE_000_060<tab>She's only a facsimile constructed from her memories. I understand this.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_ERENVILLE_000_061<tab>But when she's right there, as alive and spirited as I've ever known her, how am I supposed to do it? How am I supposed to erase her?
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_ERENVILLE_000_062<tab>Does she even know how it tears me apart?
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_ERENVILLE_000_065<tab>It's not fair...
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_WUKLAMAT_000_070<tab>We saw you from below. It looked like you were having fun.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_KRILE_000_075<tab>It will be hard, but let us send Cahciua off with a smile.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_GRAHATIA_000_080<tab>We'll be there for Erenville.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CAHCIUA_000_090<tab>I couldn't have asked for more fulfilling final hours than these.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CAHCIUA_000_095<tab>I'm so happy to have met you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You and everyone. Thank you for the memories.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_CAHCIUA_000_100<tab>And thank you for watching over my Elene'shpya. He'll be fine now, I know it.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_ERENVILLE_000_105<tab>No more doubts. I will shut the terminal down.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_KRILE_000_110<tab>Let's see our task through to the end.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_GRAHATIA_000_115<tab>We carry on, with their hopes and memories in our hearts.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_WUKLAMAT_000_120<tab>We'll leave this to you, Erenville.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_ERENVILLE_000_121<tab>Aye, I won't waver. Not anymore.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_ERENVILLE_000_122<tab>If you're ready yourselves, then so am I.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_SYSTEM_000_123<tab>Upon shutting down the Aero Terminal, it will not be possible to restore Windspath Gardens to its present form.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_SYSTEM_000_124<tab>Are you certain you wish to shut down the terminal?
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_GRAHATIA_000_125<tab>Let us finish this!
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_KRILE_000_130<tab>We won't let Cahciua's hopes be in vain!
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_ERENVILLE_000_135<tab>No time for tears... Just as well.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_WUKLAMAT_000_140<tab>Not a moment too soon... It's as if she's saying she won't let us do as we please anymore.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_WUKLAMAT_000_141<tab>Through our time here, we've come to know what it is Sphene seeks to protect.
TEXT_KINGMF113_04958_WUKLAMAT_000_142<tab>But that doesn't change what we have to do!
